text: iṉṉum, nīṅkaḷ avarkaḷiṭam āṟatal peṟutaṟkuriya (uṅkaḷ) maṉaiviyarai uṅkaḷiliruntē uṅkaḷukkāka avaṉ paṭaittiruppatum; uṅkaḷukkiṭaiyē uvappaiyum, kirupaiyaiyum uṇṭākkiyiruppatum avaṉuṭaiya attāṭcikaḷil uḷḷatākum; cintittu uṇarakkūṭiya camūkattiṟku niccayamāka, itil (pala) attāṭcikaḷ irukkiṉṟaṉa
